summary:
Making a difference & adding value, every day, in every initiative involved with. Giving it my best, at the least. If I fail. I try harder. With a smile.

A few of the things I'm active with:
â€¢	Helping organizations build knowledge & capabilities in information security! ðŸ’ª
â€¢	Guiding & advising, startups, scaleups and mature ventures; how to build secure products, be responsible with what they bring to the market & turning security by design and privacy into a USP! Innovation, security & privacy can go hand in hand.ðŸš€
â€¢	Mentoring talent, aspiring & starting entrepreneurs,on how to best realize their potential, leverage opportunities, and help making this world a better place for all of us! ðŸ‘¾

Comfortable with chaos, change and contradictions:
Great with people and technology.Business minded geek.Silent doer that feels great on stage.Outspoken thinker.Star Trek + Star Wars fan.

Solution seeker, full of intellectual curiosity.Able to recognize opportunities & potential in initiatives and people, leveraging resources in practical but innovative ways.

Sharing knowledge & collaborating is the way forward. Challenging things and one self. Entrepreneurial spirit, always looking for new opportunities & developments. Good understanding of the changing business environment, current tech trends & the transforming talent field ðŸŒŽ

Ambitious & passionate professional in the intersection of talent, business & tech. Advisor to organizations, people & initiatives.Infosec area focus,with a unique view from the human resources & strategic management perspective.Technical & commercial:solid business foundation & understanding(work experience & business grad school education),good analytical capacity & quantitative skills(engineering background).Global mindset & project management experience with diverse,multi discipline teams.Strong leadership skills acquired through various roles,including military officer experience, in different environments & cultures(Europe,N.America & Asia).
